#: i3 is a tiling window manager for X11.
This is a package group which installs the i3-gaps fork
(https://i3wm.org/)
name: i3-gaps

#: i3lock is a simple screen locker like slock. After starting it, you
will see a white screen (you can configure the color/an image). You
can return to your screen by entering your password.
(https://openports.se/x11/i3lock)
name: i3lock

#: i3status is a small program (about 1500 SLOC) for generating a status
bar for dzen2, xmobar or similar programs. It is designed to be very
efficient by issuing a very small number of system calls, as one
generally wants to update such a status line every second. This ensures
that even under high load, your status bar is updated correctly. Also,
it saves a bit of energy by not hogging your CPU as much as spawning
the corresponding amount of shell commands would.
(https://openports.se/x11/i3status)
name: i3status

#: Background browser and setter for X windows
(https://openports.se/x11/nitrogen)
name: nitrogen

#: Compton is a lightweight, standalone composite manager, suitable for use
with window managers that do not natively provide compositing
functionality.
(https://openports.se/x11/compton)
name: compton

#: A small program for hiding the mouse cursor
(https://openports.se/x11/unclutter)
name: unclutter
